BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.connection.dialect.H2XAConnectionWrapper.getNextIdMethod() uses AccessibleObject.setAccessible to modify accessibility of classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.connection.dialect.H2XAConnectionWrapper.getXAConnectionConstructor() uses AccessibleObject.setAccessible to modify accessibility of classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.connection.dialect.MySQLXAConnectionWrapper.getXAConnectionCreatorMethod() uses AccessibleObject.setAccessible to modify accessibility of classes
Field org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.datasource.XATransactionDataSource.enlistedTransactions is an instance based ThreadLocal variable
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.datasource.swapper.DataSourceSwapper.getDatabaseAccessConfiguration(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.datasource.swapper.DataSourceSwapper.getDatabaseAccessConfiguration(DataSource) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.datasource.swapper.DataSourceSwapper.findGetterMethod(DataSource, String) uses AccessibleObject.setAccessible to modify accessibility of classes
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.exception.XADataSourceInitializeException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.xa.jta.exception.XATransactionNestedBeginException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
